TEXT3.CNTEXT: 看门狗定时器一直启用[WDTON=0]

TEXT4.CNTEXT: 执行芯片擦除时保留EEPROM的内容[EESAVE=0]
TEXT4.TEXT: Preserve EEPROM memory through the Chip Erase cycle; [EESAVE=0]

TEXT5.CNTEXT: Boot区大小( 256 Words); Boot区起始地址(0X3F00)[BOOTSZ=11]
TEXT5.TEXT: Boot Flash section size=256 words Boot start address=$3F00; [BOOTSZ=11]

TEXT6.CNTEXT: Boot区大小( 512 Words); Boot区起始地址(0X3E00)[BOOTSZ=10]
TEXT6.TEXT: Boot Flash section size=512 words Boot start address=$3E00; [BOOTSZ=10]

TEXT7.CNTEXT: Boot区大小(1024 Words); Boot区起始地址(0X3C00)[BOOTSZ=01]
TEXT7.TEXT: Boot Flash section size=1024 words Boot start address=$3C00; [BOOTSZ=01]

TEXT8.CNTEXT: Boot区大小(2048 Words); Boot区起始地址(0X3800)[BOOTSZ=00]
TEXT8.TEXT: Boot Flash section size=2048 words Boot start address=$3800; [BOOTSZ=00] ; default value

TEXT9.CNTEXT: 将复位向量移至Boot区起始地址(默认地址=0X0000)[BOOTRST=0]

TEXT1.TEXT: Brown-out detection level at VCC=1.8 V; [BODLEVEL=10]

TEXT2.TEXT: Brown-out detection level at VCC=2.7 V; [BODLEVEL=01]

TEXT3.TEXT: Brown-out detection level at VCC=4.3 V; [BODLEVEL=00]

TEXT4.CNTEXT: 禁用外部怎复位，PG5用作I/O口[RSTDISBL=0]

TEXT0.CNTEXT: 无加密(没有使能存储器保护特性)[LB2=1 LB1=1]
TEXT0.TEXT: Mode 1: No memory lock features enabled

TEXT1.CNTEXT: 禁止进一步对Flash 和EEPROM 编程[LB2=1 LB1=0]

TEXT2.CNTEXT: 禁止进一步对Flash 和EEPROM 编程及验证[LB2=0 LB1=0]
TEXT2.TEXT: Mode 3: Further programming and verification disabled

TEXT3.CNTEXT: SPM 和LPM 对应用区的访问没有限制[BLB02=1 BLB01=1]
TEXT3.TEXT: Application Protection Mode 1: No lock on SPM and LPM in Application Section

TEXT4.CNTEXT: 不允许SPM 对应用区进行写操作[BLB02=1 BLB01=0]
TEXT4.TEXT: Application Protection Mode 2: SPM prohibited in Application Section

TEXT5.CNTEXT: 不允许SPM 指令对应用区进行写操作，也不允许运行于Boot Loader区的LPM指令从应用区读取数据[BLB02=0 BLB01=0]
TEXT5.TEXT: Application Protection Mode 3: LPM and SPM prohibited in Application Section

TEXT6.CNTEXT: 不允许运行于Boot Loader区的LPM 指令从应用区读取数据[BLB02=0 BLB01=1]
TEXT6.TEXT: Application Protection Mode 4: LPM prohibited in Application Section

TEXT7.CNTEXT: 允许SPM/LPM 指令访问Boot Loader区[BLB12=1 BLB11=1]
TEXT7.TEXT: Boot Loader Protection Mode 1: No lock on SPM and LPM in Boot Loader Section

TEXT8.CNTEXT: 不允许SPM 指令对Boot Loader区进行写操作[BLB12=1 BLB11=0]
TEXT8.TEXT: Boot Loader Protection Mode 2: SPM prohibited in Boot Loader Section

TEXT9.CNTEXT: 不允许SPM 指令对Boot Loader区进行写操作，也不允许运行于应用区的LPM 指令从Boot Loader区读取数据[BLB12=0 BLB11=0]
TEXT9.TEXT: Boot Loader Protection Mode 3: LPM and SPM prohibited in Boot Loader Section

TEXT10.CNTEXT: 不允许运行于应用区的LPM 指令从Boot Loader区读取数据[BLB12=0 BLB11=1]
TEXT10.TEXT: Boot Loader Protection Mode 4: LPM prohibited in Boot Loader Section
